data.text: Dahi laangi ga dau mai, gei nia daangada ga daahili,
Gadoo be nia wai magalillili ma ga hagamanawa lamalia tangada hieinu,
Di laangi ga dau mai, gei nia daangada ga daahili,
Daahili ang gi Dimaadua i ana mee humalia huogodoo ala ne hai.
Nia daangada huogodoo i Zion gi wwolowwolo dadaahili tenetene,
